Roberts: school leaders and SMTs key enablers of ANA reflection and analysis among teachers. @ZenexF @Tshikululu @DBE_SA @BridgeProjectSA
@Tshikululu rep reports resistance by teachers to planning & reflecting on other project. Roberts: deeper reflection when for assessment.
Roberts: ANA a major investment & we should applaud it. BUT: Need better design, like anchor questions, & error analysis. @BridgeProjectSA
Roberts: ANA analysis led to teachers' co-teaching and reflection across grades. Plan, teach, reflect @BridgeProjectSA @ZenexF @Tshikululu
Roberts: ANA data shoud be captured numerically by teachers to encourage discussion about why. @BridgeProjectSA @ZenexF @Tshikululu @DBE_SA
Roberts: question by question ANA data capture is of value to teachers. @BridgeProjectSA @ZenexF @Tshikululu @KhulisaMS @BenitaW @DBE_SA
